item.title: Automate SSL Certificates in Kubernetes
item.description: HTTPS is extremely important nowadays. It’s almost always a bad idea to not use it, even in the internal traffic. The good news is that we have Let’s Encrypt which can provide us by free SSL/TLS certificates and API to generate these certificates automaticaly.
